attacks.name: Flip Over
attacks.text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Surprise
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

cards.name: Deoxys ex

ability.name: Form Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys ex and switch it with Deoxys ex. (Any cards attached to Deoxys ex, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys ex on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Psychic Shield
attacks.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Deoxys ex by your opponent's Pokémon-ex during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Empty Shell
ability.text: When Shedinja is Knocked Out, your opponent doesn't take any Prize cards.

attacks.name: Extra Curse
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, put 4 damage counters instead.

cards.name: Deoxys ex

ability.name: Form Change
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys ex and switch it with Deoxys ex. (Any cards attached to Deoxys ex, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Deoxys ex on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poké-Power each turn.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Deoxys ex and the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Latios Star
text: You can't have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.

attacks.name: Miraculous Light
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter and all Special Conditions from Latios Star.

attacks.name: Shining Star
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon, discard all Energy cards attached to Latios Star and this attack does 50 damage plus 100 more damage.
